title: ADC items are too expensive
body: Should lower their cost and stats for quicker full builds :D

replies.body: I'm pretty sure IE and ER gets cost lowered by like 200 or 300 on PBE due to crit ad's getting bork instead of actual crit

{{item:3036}} You{{item:3087}} mean{{item:3046}} these{{item:3094}} ADC{{item:3085}} items?{{item:3033}} 


Point is, a decent chunk of the expensiveness of IE and BT are countered by how cheap their armor pen and crit/AS items are.
If marksman want a good early/ mid. In exchange for being trash lategame. I'd be ok with that
